opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed, costs to be borne by appellant.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this. case.

attorneys: Miles Wwner, with him Warner cG McCormack, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Vladyka, Appellant, v. McCormack.
Argued May 5, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Eagbn, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Abraham J. Levinson, for appellant.
Miles Wwner, with him Warner cG McCormack, for appellee.
October 12, 1971:
